contents:
Photography is an invaluable medium that allows us to capture the incandescent beauty of the outside world, something many of us havenâ€™t seen in… well, a hot minute. Global pandemics will do that.
But that certainly doesnâ€™t mean that beautiful photos canâ€™t be taken indoors, out of windows, or in secluded outdoor locations (safely socially distanced, of course). And perhaps now is as good a time as any to gain some helpful tips on how to do just that by taking an online photography course.

contents:
Almost every day for the past nine or so months has felt like March 13, and that can sometimes make it difficult to want to wake up for the day ahead of you.
To make a morning person out of you, the wake-up light simulates the sunrise to gradually ease you awake. This allows you to wake up more naturally rather than being jolted awake by the default iPhone alarm sound, which honestly triggers my fight or flight response.
